tool.name: CollectGcBiasMetrics

param.name: inputFile
param.label: Select SAM/BAM dataset or dataset collection
param.help: If empty, upload or import a SAM/BAM dataset.

validator.message: A built-in reference genome is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: ref_file
param.label: Use the folloing dataset as the reference sequence
param.help: REFERENCE_SEQUENCE; You can upload a FASTA sequence to the history and use it as reference

param.name: window_size
param.label: The size of windows on the genome that are used to bin reads

param.name: minimum_genome_fraction
param.label: For summary metrics, exclude GC windows that include less than this fraction of the genome

param.name: is_bisulfite_sequenced
param.label: Calculate the base distribution over PF (passing filtering) reads only

param.name: assume_sorted
param.label: Assume the input file is already sorted
